product_name: Healers Dog First Aid Essentials Kit
long_description: The Healers Dog First Aid Essentials Kit comes with everything you need to clean, treat and bandage your pet's minor injuries. Take it with you camping or hiking to stay prepared on the trail. Kit includes: 1 Paw Bootie, 1 leg wrap, 5 non-adhesive boot gauze pads, 8 non-adhesive square gauze pads and 2 latex gloves. Includes 4 oz. bottle of VetEssentials Skin and Wound Spray to clean and disinfect wounds. Includes 2 oz. bottle of Calm Coat topical spray to calm injuries, reduce itching and promote hair growth. Healers Dog First Aid Essentials Kit also includes an instruction booklet containing first-aid advice for any pet emergency.
short_description: The Healers Dog First Aid Essentials Kit comes with everything you need to clean, treat and bandage your pet's minor injuries. Take it with you camping or hiking to stay prepared on the trail.
